text: Dr. Crippen is a 1963 British biographical drama movie directed by Robert Lynn and starring Donald Pleasence, Coral Browne, Samantha Eggar, Donald Wolfit, James Robertson Justice, John Arnatt, Olga Lindo. ==Other websites== * Category:1963 drama movies Category:1960s biographical movies Category:British biographical movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on actual events Category:Movies set in the 1910s Category:Movies set in London
title: Dr. Crippen (1962 movie)
